content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gold_nugget
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 22, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft gold_nugget. Gold_nugget requires placing 1 gold_ingot in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the gold_ingot from slot 22 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gold_nugget
inventory=[{"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 22, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]
thought: Since the gold_ingot has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to craft the gold_nugget by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
